channel.title: Comments on: Short Panzer/Bazooka Montage
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Such_Description
item.dc:creator: Such_Description
item.description: Blindly fired a bazooka at a retreating calliope yesterday . Was in shock when I got a triple kill and destroyed it
item.content:encoded: Blindly fired a bazooka at a retreating calliope yesterday . Was in shock when I got a triple kill and destroyed it ðŸ˜‚

item.description: How in the Nani did you manage those air kills?

item.title: By: The_Creator44
item.dc:creator: The_Creator44
item.description: You completely earned that teabag in the last clip, great shot!
